description: GDPR-compliant template for Data Subject Access Request.
name: Data Subject Access Request Form (DSAR)

steps.title: Data Subject Access Request Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to request access to your personal data held by our organization. Your request will be processed promptly in accordance with data protection regulations. Thank you for your cooperation.

blocks.label: Requester's Full Name
blocks.help: Enter the full name of the individual making the DSAR.
blocks.name: name

blocks.label: Requester's Contact Information
blocks.help: Provide contact details such as email address and phone number for communication regarding the request.
blocks.name: contact_information

blocks.label: Requester's Address
blocks.help: Provide the postal address of the requester for mailing any requested documents or information.
blocks.name: address

blocks.label: Requester's Identification
blocks.help: Attach a copy of a valid identification document (e.g., passport, driving license) to verify the requester's identity.
blocks.name: identification

blocks.label: Preferred Delivery Method
blocks.help: Specify how the requested information should be delivered.
blocks.name: delivery_method

blocks.label: Description of Request
blocks.help: Specify the details of the information being requested, including relevant timeframes or specific data categories.
blocks.name: description_of_request

blocks.label: Additional Comments
blocks.help: Optional: Provide any additional information or context related to the request.
blocks.name: comments

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm the authenticity of the request and agree to the terms and conditions.
blocks.name: signature
